alert.note: Alert for Hamblen; Jefferson; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jefferson, northwestern Cocke, north central Sevier and southwestern Hamblen Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 317 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Sevierville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morristown, Sevierville, Jefferson City, Newport, Dandridge, White Pine, New Market, Baneberry, Bybee and Alpha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Hamblen; Jefferson; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke
